クラス MapWorker

  • java.lang.Object

  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    MapWorker_

    public class MapWorker
extends BaseMapWorker
    Created by Mizuno on 2015/01/31. Class for drawing objects on GoogleMapView You MUST call setMap at first of all
